articles.author: Haley Ott
articles.title: U.S. soldier believed to be in North Korean custody after unauthorized border crossing, officials say - CBS News
articles.description: The U.S. service member crossed the border so quickly that South Korean and American soldiers didn't have time to stop him, according to local media.
articles.content: A U.S. soldier crossed into North Korea "willfully and without authorization" and was believed to be in the custody of the country's forces, U.S. and international officials said Tuesday. The United … [+7090 chars]

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Wrestler Bajrang Punia Gets Direct Asian Games Entry, Under-23 Asian Champ Hits Out - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Proving his point further, the Under-23 wrestler said he had recently defeated American John Michael Diakomihalis by a comprehensive 8-2 margin while Bajrang had lost to the same wrestler by technical superiority in the World Championships last year.
articles.content: The reigning U23 Asian champion Sujeet Kalkal on Wednesday slammed the IOA ad-hoc committee for granting direct entry to Bajrang Punia for the Asian Games, saying it was unfair on the next generation… [+1783 chars]

articles.author: Mike Stunson
articles.title: Boy reels in freaky fish with human-like teeth in Oklahoma. It wasn’t where it should be - Yahoo News
articles.description: A pacu, a piranha-like fish with human-like teeth native to South America, was caught by a boy in a pond in Oklahoma, officials say.
articles.content:
A boy was in for a surprise when he hooked a piranha-like fish in an Oklahoma pond a long way from its home. 
The pacu fish, recently caught by Charlie Clinton in a neighborhood pond, is native to S… [+1373 chars]
